project.name: nt-mobile
project.description: Mobile-first implementation of the NextThought web app.

LoginController.name: LoginController
LoginController.description:
Coordinates login actions between the view and the dataserver
and emits related events.

classitems.description:
A bridge function between the views and the dispatcher, marking the action
as a view action.  Another variant here could be handleServerAction.

params.name: action
params.description: The data coming from the view.

classitems.description:
Registers a callback to be invoked with every dispatched payload. Returns
a token that can be used with `waitFor()`.
Removes a callback based on its token.

Waits for the callbacks specified to be invoked before continuing execution
of the current callback. This method should only be used by a callback in
response to a dispatched payload.
Dispatches a payload to all registered callbacks.

Call the calback stored with the given id. Also do some internal
bookkeeping.
Set up bookkeeping needed when dispatching.

Use invariant() to assert state which your program assumes to be true.

Provide sprintf-style format (only %s is supported) and arguments
to provide information about what broke and what you were
expecting.

The invariant message will be stripped in production, but the invariant
will remain to ensure logic does not differ in production.

Indicates whether we have the necessary information required to attempt 
a password login.
The current implementation simply reflects whether we have a link
with rel=logon.nti.password
classitems.name: canDoPasswordLogin

return.description:
Whether we have the necessary information required
to attempt a password login.

classitems.description: Indicates whether we're currently logged in.
classitems.name: isLoggedIn

classitems.description:
Updates the state with properties from data. They will be merged with the
current state so it is acceptable and expected for the argument to contain only the
parts it cares about. While this mimicks the signature of the React method, this is
not a React component and should not be confused with one.
classitems.name: setState

classitems.description: Looks up a link by its rel attribute and returns its href.
classitems.name: getHref

params.name: link_rel
params.description: The rel attribute of the sought link.

return.description: The href for the link with the specified rel attribute, or null.

classitems.description: Register to be notified of state changes for this LoginController.
classitems.name: addChangeListener

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to be invoked in response to a change event.

classitems.description: Un-register a previously registered event callback listener
classitems.name: removeChangeListener
